Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text:
Interesting experience worth trying.
Just the food seems a bit stuck in the middle. They try fine dining, but the execution is not in line with the pricing. Instead they could offer a real ‚Äòfood experience‚Äô giving you some unexpected items to taste.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: My husband and I have been to Ctaste twice. Based on the first visit, it would be 5 stars. The second visit had some hiccups but was during the COVID-19 pandemic so I think it wouldn't be fair to dock a star. Service was much slower and ‚Ä¶

Name: ctaste
Review Text: My friend and I came to Amsterdam on holiday, we saw this through Viator and thought it would be an awesome experience. IT WAS AN AWESOME EXPERIENCE! We had a ton of fun eating in the dark. The staff were awesome and the food was delicious. If I could give them 10 stars I would. I recommend everyone to try.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Everyone should try this experience. It opens the senses but most of all - increase the awareness of how people with visual impairment experience the world. The food was beyond delicious and the staff - friendly, kind and very professional. ‚Ä¶

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Very special and fun experience. The friendly staff and good tasting food make for a good night out. I was a little afraid I'd still be hungry after but it was ok√©. ‚Ä¶

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Great experience like none other. While the total darkness can be a bit unnerving at first, it quickly becomes more relaxing and really helps you focus on the flavors! Reasonably priced and amazing staff too. Can highly recommend!

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Amazing experience; bit overwhelming but worth it. Stuff is very friendly and explains the concept very well. Food is delicious. It‚Äôs really pitch black inside, so prepare to sharpen your other senses!

Name: ctaste
Review Text:
Wow! Respect for those who are blind!

Name: ctaste
Review Text: If you want to have the eating in the dark experience go for the cheapest option. We went for the Royale not worth it. You can get so much better options in Amsterdam for that amount of money. It's like going to the Ice bar... ‚Ä¶

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Very nice idea to have a meal in a full darkness. It's not possible to make the same at home. And another the best thing - to provide work place for blind people.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Very very special experience, warm welcome, great service and food, and eating in the pitch black is something everyone should do. So special

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Mind blowing experience!!! You must go to this place to have a real taste of reality. Seeing bad reviews for this place makes me think how small minded human beings can be. Go there with an open mind, great heart, close your eyes and enjoy the moment! You won‚Äôt regret it!!

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Very nice experience, great service, delicious food, nice staff.

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Awesome experience. The service is incredible since you enter the lobby, and the food was really good as well. Waiter was really cheerful

Name: ctaste
Review Text: To dine in a complete darkness it was freaky and peculiar in the same time. Something like an extreme dinner. The food was very good, the waiter was helpful, he gave us his calm. Definitely an experience that everyone should try.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: You might see the pictures and think how delicious the food looks. But well, you won't see anything here. But don't bother, the experience is amazing, plus the waiters were one of a kind (very friendly). Just enjoy the darkness while you try to discover what you ate.

Name: ctaste
Review Text:
The service was excellent.

We came for the brunch and the food was very boring. Plain grilled sandwiches ‚Ä¶

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Great experience! We got the premium dinner. A unique experience in Amsterdam. It was an unforgettable experience.

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Really interesting and fun experience (dinner in the dark), but you need to go open minded, wouldn't recommend if you get stressed easily or have claustrofobia. Other than that the food was great and you definitely laugh a lot.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Amazing experience!  It's hard to describe in words.  The staff was amazing.  The food was so good.  Be ready for something you have never experienced before.  No words to describe it.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: It was very interesting to dine in the dark.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Eating in complete darkness is an amazing experience. You are eating in a different way when you can't see your food. The food we had was amazing. It's something I would do again 10/10

Name: ctaste
Review Text: C-taste is a must try experience. Dining in the dark was a super interesting experience, but also made me a bit anxious. With time passing, you get used to it and your other senses are more alert.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: By far the best dining experience I‚Äôve had to date. Thank you for the most wonderful time and a special thank you to Jeroen and Eva for looking after us through the evening! Food was delicious especially the crackling desert. Service was spot on!

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Love the place and the experience. Today, I was there for the second time and I really like the concept... good food as the star, coupled with amazing conversations that just happen when you find yourself in the dark. Love it!

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Really amazing experience eating in the dark. Good place to go out as a team to do activities especially since everything you do is in the dark. Very professional and friendly staff.

Review Text:

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
Review Text: Good service, but the food is pretty basic and not worth the cover charge. Worth it for the experience, which was pretty unique and happy to contribute to employing people with disabilities.

Name: ctaste
Review Text: It's a nice concept, and interesting experience for one time. But probably not for everyone. It could have been better if food was not so mediocre.

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste

Name: ctaste
